about_the_game:
Bilattice is a massive puzzle game featuring over 300 hand-crafted levels and tons of unique mechanics. The mechanics interact with each other in endlessly interesting ways to produce hours of mind-bending content. The sheer number of clever gimmicks offered by this game is hard not to appreciate.

In this game, you learn the rules as you go through thoughtful level design that is meant to walk you through a series of realizations. Every puzzle is purposeful. But for those who prefer a more overt helping hand, tutorials and accessibility options are offered.

The game also goes totally off the rails for the optional, bonus content. Bilattice is a game that goes all in on any wild concept the developer could think up.

In this game, you learn the rules as you go through thoughtful level design that is meant to walk you through a series of realizations. Every puzzle is purposeful. But for those who prefer a more overt helping hand, tutorials and accessibility options are offered.

The game also goes totally off the rails for the optional, bonus content. Bilattice is a game that goes all in on any wild concept the developer could think up.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubu 18.04+
  • Processor: X64 with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable
  • Storage: 680 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.14+
  • Processor: X64 with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 330 MB available space

name: Bilattice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: X64 with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10+
  • Storage: 610 MB available space
  • VR Support: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
